issue.title: [CF 999] [Suggestion] condition for # of enemies nearby.
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using?
7.0.2

Hello!
I have encountered one small shortcoming with your otherwise incredible addon.

I think it would beneficial to have a condition for "X amount of enemy npc's in Y yards".
Example of condition:
Show icon if: [X] # of enemies are within [Y] yards.

This would be ideal for AoE rotations.

Thanks for your time and consideration.


> Posted by CurseForge user Waspp | Imported from CurseForge issue #999 | Raw

comments.body:
This isn't in any way possible. Sorry.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Alright, thanks anyway :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Waspp
